backlog

2004-09-21

fri the 10th - karaoke in kuji to celebrate 22 & 11/12 years
sat - volcano climbing
sun - sunrise @ top; come down; onsen
tue - spinal tap
wed - uge surfing after school; fire spinning lesson & supper in noda

thu - i had a class to myself, and it was a hoot. i could be myself
and goof off without the teacher there, and that class was the perfect
audience. to teach "must" we had a special robot guest with some of
those classy glasses with the eyebrows built-in... i caught myself
almost spouting out "i love you guys" for the saigo-no-aisatsu
(official class ending). uge surfing & jogging before school & surfing
after.

fri - no waves at kado in the AM, but it was beautiful; made lj's with
the yamato kids
